QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Spires of Arak!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Azik in Spires of Arak.
There have been wingless arakkoa seen fleeing from Spires of Arak. Rumors suggest that they are running from an Iron Horde superweapon.
We need to find out what is causing them to leave their homeland, and why their wings have withered.
Glory to the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Azik in the Spires of Arak.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Azik in the Spires of Arak.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Azik looks you up and down.>
Azik is betting you are someone of importance to your people.
Come closer, friend. Azik could use your help.
